command.text: select "CustomerContacts"."ID" "ID" ,"CustomerContacts"."BASVERSION" "Basversion" ,"CustomerContacts"."BASTIMESTAMP" "Bastimestamp" ,"CustomerContacts"."firstName" "FirstName" ,"CustomerContacts"."isPA" "IsPa" ,"CustomerContacts"."anniversary" "Anniversary" ,"CustomerContacts"."ext" "Ext" ,"CustomerContacts"."comments" "Comments" ,"CustomerContacts"."homePhone" "HomePhone" ,"CustomerContacts"."likes" "Likes" ,"CustomerContacts"."empHist" "EmpHist" ,"CustomerContacts"."dateInactivated" "DateInactivated" ,"CustomerContacts"."workPhone" "WorkPhone" ,"CustomerContacts"."ob_Customer_REN" "ObCustomerRen" ,"CustomerContacts"."ob_Customer_RID" "ObCustomerRid" ,"ob_Customer_R"."name" "obCustomerRName" ,"ob_Customer_Rps_Sector_R"."name" "ObCustomerRpsSectorRname" ,"CustomerContacts"."ob_Customer_RMA" "ObCustomerRma" ,"CustomerContacts"."birthday" "Birthday" ,"CustomerContacts"."salutation" "Salutation" ,"CustomerContacts"."dateAdded" "DateAdded" ,"CustomerContacts"."roles" "Roles" ,"CustomerContacts"."lastName" "LastName" ,"CustomerContacts"."familarName" "FamilarName" ,"CustomerContacts"."rolesForDisplay" "RolesForDisplay" ,"CustomerContacts"."email" "Email" ,"CustomerContacts"."dateLastChange" "DateLastChange" ,"CustomerContacts"."family" "Family" ,"CustomerContacts"."mobilePhone" "MobilePhone" ,"CustomerContacts"."title" "Title" ,"CustomerContacts"."name" "Name" from "dbo"."CustomerContacts" "CustomerContacts" left join "dbo"."Customers" "ob_Customer_R" on "CustomerContacts"."ob_Customer_RID" = "ob_Customer_R"."ID" left join "dbo"."Sectors" "ob_Customer_Rps_Sector_R" on "ob_Customer_R"."ps_Sector_RID" = "ob_Customer_Rps_Sector_R"."ID"
